name: Bombs = Magic
description:
Bombs and Magic! Use both in this turn-based artillery game pitting mysterious mages against magical mushroom!

v1.0

Made for the Ranged Combat Jam

Instructions

  • WASD/arrowkeys to move
    WS/Up-Down to aim
    AD/Left-Right to change weapon
    J/Z to shoot (hold)
    K/X to pan camera
